medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with RUQ abdominal pain lasting for a few days. The pain is described as sharp, worsening with food, and constant. Symptoms are typically exacerbated by specific foods, including clam chowder. This episode was longer and more intense than previous occurrences, with severe pain during meals and dull pain radiating to the right shoulder blade during rest.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Recurrent cholelithiasis, history of knee surgery
medical_history.family_history: Mother has hypertension and coronary artery disease
